Defunct functions in package inborutils

Source: R/connect_inbo_dbase.R, R/florabank_queries.R, R/inborutils-defunct.R, and 5 more
inborutils-defunct.Rd

The functions listed below are moved to package inbodb and removed from inborutils. Please install package inbodb to continue using these functions (instructions on https://inbo.github.io/inbodb/).

connect_inbo_dbase(database_name)

florabank_traits(connection, trait_name, collect = FALSE)

florabank_observations(connection, names, fixed = FALSE, collect = FALSE)

florabank_taxon_ifbl_year(
  connection,
  starting_year = 2010,
  ifbl_resolution = c("1km-by-1km", "4km-by-4km"),
  taxongroup = c("Vaatplanten", "Mossen", "Lichenen (korstmossen)", "Kranswieren"),
  collect = FALSE
)

inboveg_classification(connection, survey_name, classif, collect = FALSE)

inboveg_header(
  connection,
  survey_name,
  rec_type,
  multiple = FALSE,
  collect = FALSE
)

inboveg_qualifiers(connection, survey_name, qualifier_type, multiple = FALSE)

inboveg_recordings(connection, survey_name, collect = FALSE, multiple = FALSE)

inboveg_survey(connection, survey_name, collect = FALSE)

connect_inbo_dbase

For connect_inbo_dbase, use inbodb::connect_inbo_dbase()

florabank_traits

For florabank_traits, use inbodb::florabank_traits()

florabank_observations

For florabank_observations, use inbodb::florabank_observations()

florabank_taxon_ifbl_year

For florabank_taxon_ifbl_year, use inbodb::florabank_taxon_ifbl_year()

inboveg_classification

For inboveg_classification, use inbodb::inboveg_classification()

inboveg_header

For inboveg_header, use inbodb::inboveg_header()

inboveg_qualifiers

For inboveg_qualifiers, use inbodb::inboveg_qualifiers()

inboveg_recordings

For inboveg_recordings, use inbodb::inboveg_recordings()

inboveg_survey

For inboveg_survey, use inbodb::inboveg_survey()
